price: 85. Quiconque recherche une autre religion que l’Islam, elle ne sera pas acceptée de lui et, dans l’autre monde, il sera parmi les perdants.
arabic: وَمَن يَبۡتَغِ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡإِسۡلَٰمِ دِينٗا فَلَن يُقۡبَلَ مِنۡهُ وَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waman yabtaghi ghayra al-is'lāmi dīnan falan yuq'bala min'hu wahuwa fī al-ākhirati mina al-khāsirīna
